<html><body><div><div class="mx-auto mb-6 px-4 md:px-0 text-lg font-normal leading-8 text-gray-800"><p class="Paragraph_wrapper__6w7GG">The next phase of President Donald Trump's Gaza plan calls for resolving ​complex ​issues such as Hamas disarmament, which the group ​has long rejected, a further Israeli withdrawal from Gaza ​and the deployment of an international peacekeeping force.</p></div></div></body></html>
